short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The official Reymit extension. This is an All-in-one extension that contains multiple features and functionalities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an All-in-one extension that contains multiple features and functionalities that are related to Reymit's services. 

Current features:
â€¢ ReymitSub twitch integration: If the extension is installed and active, ReymitSub button will appear in all twitch streams, which allows you to use ReymitSub without leaving twitch's website.

A lot more functionalities will be added soon.
